subject: URGENT - Refund Still Not Received - Order #SSN3936
description_text:
Hello,

I am writing to express my frustration regarding my refund for order #SSN3936.

On December 24th, you informed me that the refund would be processed "immediately upon returning on the 28th." It is now January 2nd, and I have still not received my â‚¬376.02.

To summarize the timeline:
- December 6th: I shipped the items back via Bpost
- Mid-December: You confirmed receipt and inspection
- December 24th: You promised to process the refund on December 28th
- January 2nd: Still no refund

Under EU Consumer Rights Directive 2011/83/EU, refunds must be issued within 14 days of receiving returned goods. You have now exceeded this legal deadline by approximately three weeks.

I am giving you until Friday, January 10th, to process my refund in full. If I do not receive it by then, I will:
1. File an official complaint with the European Consumer Centre Belgium (ECC)
2. Initiate a chargeback through my payment provider
3. Leave public reviews detailing this experience

Please confirm receipt of this email and provide a concrete refund date within 48 hours.

Regards,
Youness Rami.

conversations.body_text: Hi Younessrami,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Your refund has been processed. Please check your account.
